name: People Organized to Demand Environmental and Economic Rights (PODER)
description: PODER is a grassroots organization for environmental justice in San Francisco's Mission District. Their mission is to work with Mission residents on local solutions to problems facing low-income and communities of color. PODER believes that everyone should be involved in making decisions that affect the community. They work towards social, economic, and environmental justice through collective action.
